props.question: When should you use a while loop instead of a for loop?
options: When the number of iterations is unknown and depends on a condition
When iterating over a specific range of numbers
When you need to repeat code exactly 10 times
When storing data in a list
props.explanation: While loops are best used when you don't know how many times you need to iterateâ€”the loop continues until a condition becomes false.
